title.en: Rainy Echoes of the Chrome Dragon

description.ko: 사이버네틱한 스케일과 습한 네온 빛이 교차하는 미래 도시 협곡의 낭만적인 비전을 담았습니다.
description.en: A romanticized vision of a futuristic urban canyon where cybernetic scale and humid neon light intersect.

prompt: Low-angle cinematic wide shot of a rain-slicked #1A0033 cyberpunk alleyway. Saturated #FF00FF and #00FFFF neon signs reflect in deep asphalt puddles. A colossal #FF6B35 holographic dragon weaves between rusted metal skyscrapers, its scales casting volumetric orange light through the heavy fog. Hyper-detailed textures of wet carbon fiber and rainy glass, 8k, Unreal Engine 5 raytracing.
